definitions.definition: Towards the wind, or the direction from which the wind is blowing.
examples: The windward boat must give way to the leeward boat.

definitions.definition: On the side exposed to the wind.
In a position of advantage or superiority .

main_definition: Towards the wind, or the direction from which the wind is blowing.
secondary_definitions: On the side exposed to the wind.
( figurative ) In a position of advantage or superiority .
